name: Adventures in Morality: An Interactive Case Study (Dr. Hank Treadsoft)
name_original: Adventures in Morality: An Interactive Case Study (Dr. Hank Treadsoft)
description:
The Making Of Adventures in Morality:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-U0Vur-8WDM

 AiM is a computer program and science fiction narrative exhibited at the Electronic Literature Organization conference in July of 2020.  

It is the first of three programs intended to calculate the players’ sympathy-type, perspective, and ability to compromise.  

 The primary story follows Cybil, an immature artificial superintelligence, who intends to unite all of humanity by force.     

Adventures in Morality is created by Daniel Roche. Original song "Nuncius" is written and performed by Patrick Fadely and Brad Bassler.
